item.title: Comparing SV: Viola, SV clustering, MARS and TT-MARS
item.description: Viola: a structural variant signature extractor with user-defined classifications Sugita et al Bioinformatics 2022 Website Viola is a python package to merge SV calls and look for mutation signatures in cancer samples. It’s intended to be used within Python scripts. The annotation (can) include: SV types/length Genes Fragile sites Replication timing Microhomology The “categories” can be customized as the intersection of multiple simpler ones, e.g. “duplications larger than XXbp in fragile sites”.

item.title: Lit skimming: CNV in Brazilian cohort, epigenomic & SVs in human and chimp
item.description: Copy number variation (CNV) identification, interpretation, and database from Brazilian patients Genet Mol Biol. 2020 adress lack of diversity in genomics study thanks to diverse/admixed Brazilian population. Methods 268 clinical samples, inc. neurodev disorders and/or congenital malformations. microarrays. SVs> 50 probes and >150-200 kbp annotation with DGV, DEVIPHER, ClinVar, ClinGen, RefSeq genes. ACMG guidelines pathogenic if not in DGV (>=3 individuals and >50% coverage) and: >3Mb; or known; or OMIM gene + DECIPHER/ClinVar/ClinGen + phenotype match Results: more frequent CNVs in their dataset compared to open resources (which?

item.title: Functional SVs: GWAS, long-read for NDDs, disruption prediction
item.description: Association of Structural Variation with Cardiometabolic Traits in Finns bioRxiv Chen et al. (2020) From the intro Targeted analysis of known SVs across large cohorts associated HP and LPA with cholesterol levels In this study >20x WGS SV calling svtools: discovery with LUMPY, CNVnator, svtyper; then genotyping. GenomeSTRiP and CNVnator for cohort-level CNVs. 55k DEL, 32k DUP, 187 INV, 3k MEI, 34k mCNV (, 4k BND).
